text: Songs from Call Me Claus is a reissue of Garth Brooks and the Magic of Christmas, second Christmas album by American country music artist Garth Brooks, and was released on September 25, 2001. The songs exclusive to this release are "Call Me Claus," "Mary Had a Little Lamb," and "'Zat You, Santa Claus?". ==Track listing== #"Call Me Claus" (Garth Brooks, Lisa Sanderson, Jenny Yates) – 2:08 #"It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year" (Edward Pola, George Wyle) – 2:57 #"Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas" (Ralph Blane, Hugh Martin) – 4:05 #"Let It Snow!
